english.segment1: Island life in the sun. Tryin' to hide from everyone. Livin' a life that pleases you. Big walls that hide you. Where were you those days " Wooooo. When love called, you were away " Wooooo. You know people lost yeh. Bring down those walls yeh
english.segment2: Chorus. Its time to make a stand, get up, get up. Its time to take the land. Get up, get up for love
english.segment3: Island life in the sun tryin' to hide from everyone. Livin' a life that pleases you, big walls that hide you. Friends lost with hell to pay " Woooo. Will you let them go that way. People caught by death yeh " Woooo. Do you love the lost yeh " Woooo
english.segment5: Bridge. The devil comes to rob and to steal. Secret believer, believe me it's real
